Package uk.ac.ed.methodius

Class Summary
Command The Command class provides a simple command interface to Methodius primarily for testing.
Configuration holds the configuration information for Methodius.
ContentList ContentList is a list containing the Facts selected for expression from the ContentPotential.
ContentPotential Graph made up of Entities and Facts representing limited Content Potential.
CPFact Implements a Fact in the content selection process.
CPPrinter Pretty prints a Content Potential in indented form taking account of back pointers by keeping a list of Entities already printed and not reprinting them.
DataStore handles the database loading, content potential creation and retrieval of objects and limited content potential webs.
Entity represents an Entity in the Content Potential.
Expression  
Fact represents a Fact object in the Content Potential.
GUI  
Log Log program output to s.o.
LogicalForm  
LogicalForms  
MethodiusRealizer  
MultipleTPFact Implements a multiple Fact in the text planning process.
NP  
NPNode  
Predicate  
PredicateHandler Predicates are stored in the PredicateHandler.
PredNode  
Publisher The publisher is really the top of the Methodius chain.
Realiser Realiser encapsulates a set of logical forms for an object description.
ReferringExpression Class to create a Referring Expression for an entity or piece of canned text based on the previous referring expressions in this description and focus information.
ReferringExpressionHistory Class to store a history of what referring expressions have been used.
SignificanceHandler handles the predicate significance table.
SingleTPFact Implements a single fact in the text planning process
TextPlan  
TPFact Implements a Fact in the content selection process.
Type  
TypeHandler Methodius has a type hierarchy.
UserModel  
Util
